original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A minor tremor was experienced in the eastern region of Sellakataragama on Monday (15) night, reported the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau.
GSMB Acting Director Ajith Prema said the tremor measured a magnitude 2.5, and it had taken place at approximately 10:24 PM.
He added that the tremor was recorded across all seismic meters in the country.
However, he said that only a small group of people had experienced the tremor.
